= Stats window - `aard_statmon_gmcp.xml` =

Displays your current stats in a miniwindow.

== What does it look like? ==
Something like this:

http://aardwolfclientpackage.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/wiki_images/stats.png

== Are there right-click options? ==
Of course!

http://aardwolfclientpackage.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/wiki_images/statsright.png

==== Flip Orientation ====
Some people like a single column, more vertical orientation for the stats display.

http://aardwolfclientpackage.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/wiki_images/statsstacked.png

==== Change Font ====
Changes the font used for display.
